{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=WAP2102 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/16/2007 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=MQ4WAP2102 |ic_id= |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205AMC-20G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S16800A-7TL |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Attansic |eth_chip2_model=F2 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Wireless 802.11b/g Portable Router'' [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/abocom-wap2102-80211bg-portable-router-1541 On Speedguide.net]
{{TechInfoDepot|AboCom_WAP2102}}
[http://www.ovislink.ca/WAP2102/wap2102.htm On Ovislink] "M01-W2101-D10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Per the [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=17613 OpenWrt forums], this hardware is used by the Planex GW-MF54G2. Default credentials are per the FCC manual. :The manual specifies the default SSID as '''Untitled'''.
